title: TDR - Trade Duty Refund | Cristina Piangatello's Profile
bio: Cristina is an experienced customs and EU trade compliance consultant with a solid background in both freight forwarding and international trade advisory. She supports companies in meeting EU customs requirements, managing regulatory complexity, and ensuring compliant access to international markets. Her experience spans key sectors such as food & beverage, fashion, consumer goods, pharmaceuticals, chemicals, automotive, and machinery.
skills: <ul class="interline"><li><strong>EU Customs Compliance</strong>: Cristina advises on customs legislation, helping clients implement effective compliance strategies, with a focus on tariff classification, origin determination and customs valuation of goods.</li><li><strong>Export Controls & Market Access</strong>: she supports businesses in meeting export control obligations and navigating product compliance, certifications, and labelling for both EU and non-EU markets.</li><li><strong>AEO and Customs Authorisations:</strong>: with hands-on experience,  Cristina assists in obtaining and managing AEO status and other customs authorisations, streamlining trade flows and strengthening trusted trader status.</li></ul>
geo: Cristinaâ€™s expertise is in the EU. She is based in Italy
